attributes.action: make stockings VAT free to boost sales and help make the UK a symbol of class once again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The news has come throught that stocking sales all falling maybe due to price maybe due to what they are. This petition is to clear VAT from stocking making them cheaper so people can buy them helping the United Kingdom become a Symbol of Class once again!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
